active_learning.discussion_prompt: How would you apply this concept in your work environment?
active_learning.peer_teaching: In pairs, one learner teaches the other core concepts such as change detection, system monitoring, and scanning methods (signature-based, heuristic, behavioral). The listener summarizes and asks clarifying questions, then switches roles. Use think-pair-share to address prerequisites like the CIA triad and basic malware types (virus, worm, trojan).
active_learning.problem_solving: Scenario: An organization experiences a ransomware infection despite anti-virus deployment. Design a multi-step response plan using anti-virus/anti-spyware tools, including scanning, quarantine, removal, and post-incident review. Incorporate selection criteria, configuration best practices from NIST SP 800-83, and integration with risk management.
